last_episode_to_air.name: Secrets Revealed
last_episode_to_air.overview: The cast members preview some of the funniest and most heartfelt unseen moments from the season.

name: Vanderpump Rules
overview: Follow the passionate, volatile and hot-and-bothered-staff at Lisa Vanderpump’s West Hollywood mainstay SUR. Lisa balances her motherly instincts and shrewd business sense to keep control over this wild group of employees as they pursue their dreams and each other while working at her “Sexy, Unique Restaurant.”

episodes.name: Welcome to SUR
episodes.overview: Lisa Vanderpump's new hire for SUR, Scheana, is ostracized because of her past affair with a married man. Scheana's co-worker, Stassi, the self-proclaimed "leader of the pack" leads the charge against Scheana, labeling her a "homewrecker." Eventually, Scheana, with Lisa's encouragement, stands up to Stassi, serving notice that she's at the restaurant to stay.

episodes.name: This Is Break-up
episodes.overview: Lisa enlists the help of her SUR staff to celebrate Gay Pride with an over-the-top parade float, but when Stassi catches Scheana and Jax flirting, the fighting and fallout threaten to ruin the day. Jax desperately wants to get his relationship with Stassi back on track, but his drunken behavior at a SUR birthday party might be the final straw that ends his relationship with Stassi for good.

episodes.name: You Don't Know Jax
episodes.overview: After the blow up at the "Gay Pride" event, Lisa struggles to keep the staff's personal conflicts outside of their work at SUR. At a photo shoot, Kristen has an awkward encounter with someone from Tom's past. Jax makes a bold play to win back Stassi, but a shocking revelation pushes her to a new man.

episodes.name: Vegas With a Vengeance
episodes.overview: The SUR staff heads to Las Vegas for Stassi's birthday and leaves Lisa very short handed at the restaurant on her busiest night of the week, but Scheana stays back to make sure things run smoothly. Stassi disinvites Jax from Vegas so she can spend the weekend with her new boyfriend Frank, but when Jax crashes the party, a fight breaks out that will divides the group and threatens strong friendships.

episodes.name: I'm Not a Bitch
episodes.overview: Stassi comes back from Vegas to find that SUR is not the same, as Jax has started dating one of her friends, and Katie and Kristen have turned against her. When Lisa calls a staff meeting to put a stop to the infighting, Laura-Leigh explodes on Stassi for sending her bullying texts. Scheana nervously prepares for her first live performance at the world-famous Roxy, where after a rocky start, she not only steals the show but makes a very unexpected friend.

episodes.name: Caught With Your Trousers Down
episodes.overview: When Jax and Laura-Leigh are caught having sex in SUR's bathroom and Frank insults a customer, Lisa is forced to crack the whip on her staff, resulting in a firing. Stassi thinks her life is back on track when she makes up with her old friend Katie and introduces her new boyfriend Frank to her parents, but when an unexpected argument escalates, Stassi finds herself headed for her second break-up of the summer.

episodes.name: In Love With Someone Else
episodes.overview: When Lisa threatens to fire Stassi for neglecting her responsibilities at SUR and as a writer for Lisa's website, Stassi must plead to keep her jobs. Scheana has an emotional breakdown at work when Lisa forbids her to work a party Brandi is attending. Jax makes a bold move to win Stassi back, causing Laura-Leigh to attack Jax for dumping her without an explanation.

episodes.name: Last Call
episodes.overview: Lisa organizes a sexy photo-shoot for the staff of SUR, bringing everyone together for an explosive season finale. Scheana attempts to win back Lisa's respect after storming out of her V.I.P. dinner. After a summer of bitter fighting, Kristen and Stassi try to bury the hatchet, and the truth is finally revealed about the rumors surrounding Jax.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: Hosted by Bravo's Andy Cohen, the cast of Vanderpump Rules along with Lisa Vanderpump, reunite at SUR to discuss some of the most talked about antics of the season.

episodes.name: Reunion Secrets
episodes.overview: Serving up never-before-seen moments from first season, Lisa Vanderpump and the SUR team speak candidly with Andy Cohen about the fights, fun, hook-ups, and heartbreaks that you didn't get to see, like Stassi and Kristen's bikini blowout, the secrets of Tom's hair, Jax's Speedo stuffing, the definition of "crymax," and Lisa discovers who on her staff wears "padded knickers."

episodes.name: Tooth and Consequences
episodes.overview: In the first episode of the season, Lisa Vanderpump struggles to keep the unpredictable staff of SUR in line as they cater a Beverly Hills party for Kyle Richards. Jax works to win Stassi back, Kristen deals with a shocking revelation in her relationship with Tom, and Scheana’s birthday ends in a fight that once again turns SUR against her.

episodes.name: Branded
episodes.overview: Jax gets a tattoo of Stassi's name to prove his love, but before the ink is even dry, a romantic dinner turns into a shouting match when Stassi reveals there’s another guy in her life. Later, Stassi attacks Scheana for turning Lisa against her, and Tom attempts to put together the pieces of his broken relationship with Kristen but finds the instructions hard to follow.

episodes.name: Only the Lonely
episodes.overview: Stassi rekindles her romance with Jax when the SUR staff heads to her mom’s house in Lake Arrowhead. Tom prepares for the biggest performance of his career, but a late-night battle with Kristen threatens to derail the weekend. When Scheana complains of yet another injury, Lisa smacks her down for playing the sympathy card.

episodes.name: Rumors
episodes.overview: When Stassi finds out about Jax’s sexy photo shoot with a female model, she questions whether she can trust him enough to ever love him again. Just when Kristen’s work life and love life appear to be back on track, Lisa brings in a sexy female bartender who may have a romantic past with Tom.

episodes.name: Surlesque
episodes.overview: Lisa enlists Stassi and Katie to perform a sexy dance at Guillermo's surprise burlesque birthday party. Jax is confronted with a health scare but receives scorn instead of sympathy from Stassi. Then, Kristen picks a fight to stop the gossiping about Tom and the new bartender.

episodes.name: Lisa's Angels
episodes.overview: Lisa and the SUR staff take part in the Gay Pride Parade. Things turn ugly when Stassi finds out that Jax is back to his womanizing ways. Kristen finds new evidence about Tom and Ariana’s relationship and confronts them both.

episodes.name: Addicted
episodes.overview: Lisa tries to wish Peter a happy 30th birthday, but when Scheana gives Peter an inappropriate lap dance, Katie and Kristen pick a fight and run Scheana out of the party. Stassi accuses Jax of being a sex addict, only to learn that Jax may have slept with one of her best friends.

episodes.name: Sherlock Stassi
episodes.overview: After Katie reveals the rumor that Kristen slept with Jax, Stassi hatches an elaborate plan to trick them into confessing. Lisa hires a "secret diner" to evaluate the service at SUR, but the staff is more focused on rumors than customers.

episodes.name: Rich People Annoy Me
episodes.overview: Vicious behavior abounds when the ladies from "The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills" arrive for a dinner party at SUR. Meanwhile, Kristen's preoccupation with rumors about Tom leads to a five-woman shouting showdown.

episodes.name: SUR of the Border
episodes.overview: Lisa's staff heads to Cabo for Stassi's 25th birthday, but a vulgar comment from Scheana turns the celebration into a catfight. When a drunken argument ends with a drink thrown in Katie's face, Stassi lashes out at her friends for taking the spotlight away from her birthday.

episodes.name: Ultimatum
episodes.overview: Stassi's Cabo birthday continues to unravel as Jax crashes her booze cruise and brings uninvited guests. Kristen gives Lisa an ultimatum that doesn't sit well with her boss. After a final night of drinking, Kristen's shocking decision forever changes her friendships.

episodes.name: Til Death Do Us Part
episodes.overview: Lisa and Stassi throw Scheana the perfect surprise engagement. Tom lashes out at Jax for his part in the cheating rumors, but later shocks Stassi with his own news. Kristen’s meltdown at SUR causes her friends to retreat and support her archrival, Ariana.

episodes.name: Bitch Slap
episodes.overview: When Stassi believes that Kristen committed the ultimate betrayal, she devises a plan to expose her in front of all of her friends. Lisa struggles to keep SUR’s working dynamics under control when tensions between Jax, Tom, Stassi and Kristen reach all-time highs.

episodes.name: I Lied
episodes.overview: In the season finale, SUR's sexy annual photo shoot turns tearful as Stassi attacks Jax for his womanizing, and Lisa helps Tom deal with the growing evidence of Kristen’s infidelity. Things come to an explosive head at Scheana’s engagement party when Kristen and Tom finally face off with Stassi and Jax.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Andy Cohen brings Lisa Vanderpump and her sexy staff together at SUR for the first time since the shocking season finale. Stassi faces off against Kristen, Tom makes a surprise revelation about his relationship with Ariana, and Jax and Tom confront each other for the first time since their fight. Andy uncovers who's been dumped, who's sleeping with whom, and who might be leaving SUR for good.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: In part two of the Vanderpump Rules reunion, the SUR staff open up to Andy Cohen about why Kristen slept with Jax, why Jax has no remorse towards his old friend Tom, and whether Stassi can overcome the hurt and betrayal. Nothing has been the same since the explosive finale, and Lisa reveals how she's been keeping it together at SUR, where old friendships and couples have split, and as always new, even more controversial alliances and romances have taken their place.

episodes.name: Secrets Revealed
episodes.overview: The episode features never-before-seen moments, as Andy Cohen visits Lisa Vanderpump and SUR to discuss the most revealing, embarrassing, and hilarious scenes you didn't see this season. Stassi attacks Jax for claiming he's "in a relationship" with a girl he's never met; frozen vodka helps Scheana reveal how she really feels about Stassi, Katie and Kristen; Tom reveals his darkest fantasy about seeing Kristen with another man; Katie shows Schwartz what half a bikini wax looks like; and Lisa accidentally reveals too much about her sex life.

episodes.name: Instafight
episodes.overview: Lisa Vanderpump is still reigning supreme whilst Stassi returns from New York to discover that things have changed between her and her former friends.

episodes.name: All Fired Up
episodes.overview: On the eve of her largest restaurant opening yet, Lisa must dole out harsh punishments to the SUR staff for their appalling behavior at Scheana's birthday party. Jax tries to do the right thing by choosing between his two girlfriends, but finds honesty has its downfalls. Stassi coaches Tom Schwartz on how to charm Lisa into giving him a fair shot at his new job at PUMP.

episodes.name: Grand Opening and Closure
episodes.overview: After going over the budget and past schedule, Lisa struggles to make the grand opening of PUMP a huge success. Stassi confronts Scheana over her mean-spirited tweets, but Scheana maintains she only retweeted what someone else already said. Kristen seeks closure with Tom Sandoval, but watching Ariana take her place triggers her innermost feelings for her ex-boyfriend.

episodes.name: Jax "Nose" Best
episodes.overview: Stassi reconnects with the SUR crowd at a Hollywood party, but Scheana and Kristen make sure she doesn’t enjoy a happy homecoming. Jax learns who his real friends are when he undergoes a painful nose job. Tom Schwartz suffers a panic attack and runs out on his job at PUMP, infuriating both Katie and Lisa Vanderpump.

episodes.name: In the Doghouse
episodes.overview: Kristen and Tom Sandoval return to SUR after their suspensions, Tom Schwartz adopts a puppy, Jax spreads rumours that Katie cheated, and Lisa offers Stassi an opportunity to prep her for a photo shoot.

episodes.name: Kiss and Tell
episodes.overview: Kristen reveals that Tom Schwartz may be cheating on Katie. Katie interrogates the SUR staff about Schwartz's infidelity and discovers they know more than expected. Lisa hosts the "50 Gay Mayors" event at PUMP.

episodes.name: New Girl, Old Grudges
episodes.overview: With Gay Pride coming up, Lisa hires a new hostess named Vail, who immediately catches Jax's eye. Stassi berates Tom Schwartz for remaining friends with Jax and James feels the strain of Kristen's ongoing obsession with Tom and Ariana.

episodes.name: Mind the Jax
episodes.overview: While pursuing the new hostess, Jax gets caught in a lie about his current girlfriend, and James tries to clear the air with Tom Sandoval before Scheana's party. Katie and Tom Schwartz seek couples therapy.

episodes.name: What Happens in San Diego
episodes.overview: Lisa advises Scheana to invite Stassi and Katie to her bachelorette party in Miami, and a night of drinking and debauchery prompts Tom Sandoval to accuse Jax of going too far.

episodes.name: Bachelorette Beach Party
episodes.overview: The SUR crew members put aside their differences to celebrate at Scheana's bachelorette party in Miami; Tom Sandoval accuses Jax of being a womanizer; when a PUMP manager quits, Lisa calls on her daughter, Pandora, to step in.

episodes.name: Tears Over Miami
episodes.overview: Jax reunites with an old friend at Scheana's bachelorette party, making the group wonder if Jax is keeping secrets about his past; Tom Sandoval pleads with Kristen to stop harassing Ariana; Lisa confronts Stassi about cutting Katie out of her life.

episodes.name: A Stand Against Stassi
episodes.overview: When Stassi refuses to forgive Katie for attending Scheana’s bachelorette party, Katie must either fight for her friendship or cut Stassi out of her life. Peter mistakes Vail’s flirting for interest and asks her on a date that quickly turns awkward. Kristen connects with the girl Tom Sandoval allegedly cheated with in hopes of finally breaking up his relationship with Ariana.

episodes.name: Miami Vices
episodes.overview: Lisa confronts Kristen about her disrespect for management and arrives at a final decision in regards to her future at SUR; Tom Schwartz makes a shocking revelation to Katie; Scheana debates whether to rescind Kristen's wedding invitation.

episodes.name: Judgement Day
episodes.overview: Lisa confronts Kristen about her disrespect for management and arrives at a final decision in regards to her future at SUR; Tom Schwartz makes a shocking revelation to Katie; Scheana debates whether to rescind Kristen's wedding invitation.

episodes.name: For Better or Worse
episodes.overview: The SUR crew comes together to celebrate Scheana's wedding day, but Scheana experiences a meltdown as the day of her dreams turns into a nightmare; James confronts Kristen over her continued obsession with Tom Sandoval.

episodes.name: Ring on a String
episodes.overview: Scheana breaks down when her plan for a perfect wedding falls apart. Kristen lives up to everyone’s worst expectations when she fights with James at the reception. Tom Schwartz makes a bad situation worse when his apology gift to Katie leads to tears.

episodes.name: Jax Cracks
episodes.overview: While Jax struggles to remain loyal, Stassi tells Kristen how to make Jax reveal Tom's alleged cheating; James apologizes to Kristen to salvage their relationship; Lisa teams up with singer Lance Bass to host a puppy adoption event at PUMP.

episodes.name: Dethroned
episodes.overview: SUR's annual photo shoot turns tense as Tom Sandoval confronts Jax over his betrayal; Katie forces Tom Schwartz to take action in their relationship; Stassi accepts Lisa's invitation to the restaurant's anniversary party.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Andy Cohen interviews Lisa Vanderpump and her staff; Kristen reveals a surprising new friendship; Tom Sandoval defends his fight with James at Scheana's birthday; Jax addresses the rumor about his romantic past with a man from Miami.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: Lisa Vanderpump and the SUR staff open up about their issues with Stassi; Tom Sandoval and Ariana confront Kristen about "Miami Girl;" Tom Schwartz responds to Katie's marriage ultimatum; Stassi reveals why she is no longer friends with Scheana.

episodes.name: Secrets Revealed
episodes.overview: Lisa Vanderpump and her staff members discuss never-before-seen moments; Katie attacks Jax for meddling in her relationship; Tom Schwartz freaks out during a medical procedure; a consultant's suggestions rub Lisa the wrong way; Andy Cohen hosts.

episodes.name: Playtime's Over
episodes.overview: Scheana throws a costume party for her birthday, but drama ensues when Kristen arrives, in the Season 4 premiere. Also: Lisa vows to take the restaurant to new heights; James' behavior jeopardizes his DJ career; and Schwartz realizes he's ready to commit to Katie.

episodes.name: New Blood
episodes.overview: When Lisa Vanderpump brings new blood to the shark-infested waters of SUR, Katie and Scheana quickly teach new girl Lala that there's no such thing as a secret at Lisa's restaurant. Rumors spread that James was unfaithful to Kristen, and Kristen must make a tough choice about who to believe. Jax imports a new girlfriend from Kentucky and Scheana continues to feel the heat from Ariana over her friendship with Kristen.

episodes.name: Pretty Little Lies
episodes.overview: When Scheana and Katie bust Lala for lying about a modeling job in Italy, Lisa Vanderpump turns the table on them for picking on the new girl. Scheana worries her marriage may be in danger when it's revealed that her husband has been keeping secrets. Tom and Ariana try "adulting," Jax and James compete for Lala's affection and Tom Schwartz makes a big step towards committing to Katie.

episodes.name: Happily Never After
episodes.overview: Lisa Vanderpump and the SUR crew force Scheana to reassess her marriage now that Shay's secret life is out in the open. Jax campaigns to get his new flame a job at SUR, even while things heat up between him and Lala. Sandoval and Schwartz pitch Lisa a business plan. Kristen and James seek couple’s therapy.

episodes.name: Cock of the Walk
episodes.overview: Convinced Kristen is cheating on him, James hooks up with Lala; Lisa teaches her staff about fine wine; Jax schemes to attract Lala away from James and recruits Kristen to help him.

episodes.name: Love Bites
episodes.overview: Lisa throws two huge parties for Gay Pride; James flaunts fresh love bites, and everyone wants to know who was responsible; Tom Sandoval and Tom Schwartz kick-start Shay's makeover; Jax seizes an opportunity to move in on Lala.

episodes.name: Spit Take
episodes.overview: Lisa treats a group of underprivileged kids to the full SUR experience, including a serving of bad behavior from her staff. Jax stands up for Kristen when her break up with James turns ugly. Ariana's mood sours when Sandoval contemplates going to Vegas without her, Schwartz and Sandoval fail to impress with their business plan, and Jax asks Brittany to move in with him.

episodes.name: Dirty Thirty
episodes.overview: Lisa advises the women to get back at their boyfriends for going to Las Vegas, so Lala, Katie and Ariana kiss and make up at Scheana's sleepover; Jax, Schwartz and Sandoval strive to remain loyal to their girlfriends while in Sin City.

episodes.name: What Happened in Vegas
episodes.overview: Sandoval and Schwartz learn that not all that happens in Vegas stays in Vegas when they surprise their girlfriends with shocking news; Kristen returns to SUR, but Ariana is not ready to forgive; Tom Sandoval and Ariana take the stage at the Improv.

episodes.name: No Strings Attached
episodes.overview: Tom Schwartz finally mans up and plans to get down on one knee for Katie, but Lisa Vanderpump worries that his complicated proposal scheme will end in disaster. Brittany moving in with Jax doesn't stop him from moving in on Lala. Ariana's attitude drives Scheana and Katie closer to Kristen, Sandoval tries to correct a huge mistake, and Kristen and James get left out in the cold when the SUR crew plans a tropical vacation.

episodes.name: Fully Engaged
episodes.overview: Lisa Vanderpump holds Stassi at arm's length; Scheana and Ariana realize their friendship is damaged; James schemes to get an invitation to Hawaii with the others; Katie shows off her engagement ring at SUR; Faith and Lala go skinny-dipping.

episodes.name: Leis, Liquor and Lies
episodes.overview: The gang heads to Hawaii to celebrate Jax and Tom's birthdays; Tom learns Scheana sent derogatory text messages about him to Ariana's mother; Katie lashes out when Lala swims naked in front of Schwartz.

episodes.name: The Bitch Is Back
episodes.overview: When Stassi visits Kristen, she reveals the truth about her sex tape; Arian refuses to accept Scheana's apologies; Lala kicks James out of bed; Jax winds up in jail.

episodes.name: Sex, Lies and Stassi's Videotape
episodes.overview: Accused of shoplifting, Jax must answer to the law, to his girlfriend and to Lisa Vanderpump; Stassi returns to SUR to repay Lisa for keeping the sex tape from leaking; James and Lala cannot keep their hands off each other during a photo shoot.

episodes.name: Pucker & Pout
episodes.overview: Katie launches her Web site with a party, but a surprise appearance by James and a text message from Stassi threaten to ruin the event; Jax adjusts to life as an unemployed outlaw while Brittany adjusts to her new life as sole breadwinner.

episodes.name: Bitch Ghost
episodes.overview: When Stassi runs into her old SUR crew at Lala's party, Scheana must finally answer for her part in Stassi's sex tape scandal. Jax brags about his girlfriend's breast enhancement, but his friends are not impressed. Tom Sandoval works on a new single, Kristen continues her serial dating, and Tom Schwartz lands in hot water with Katie when he quits his job for Lisa Vanderpump.

episodes.name: Beach, Please
episodes.overview: Jax's girlfriend, Brittany, undergoes breast augmentation surgery. Lisa is faced with a big decision after James makes a scene at PUMP, Tom Sandoval removes the tattoo on his buttocks and Ariana makes a stunning statement at Katie's beach party.

episodes.name: Too Little, Too Late
episodes.overview: Katie surprises Stassi in Palm Springs. Meanwhile, James continues to focus on Kristen; Scheana frets that she's losing her friends; and Jax, Tom Schwartz and Peter try to serve as babysitters.

episodes.name: Just the T.I.P.
episodes.overview: Katie begs to hold her engagement party at Villa Rosa, but Lisa Vanderpump balks because Stassi and Kristen are on the guest list. Jax questions everything as his court date gets closer and Tom Sandoval shoots a video to launch his music career.

episodes.name: Push Comes to Shove
episodes.overview: Lisa Vanderpump hosts Katie and Tom's engagement party; Stassi and Kristen stir up trouble; Jax must atone for his sins during a reunion with Stassi; Tom Sandoval performs his new song at SUR; Lala gets close to Kristen and James.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Kristen finds herself in the hot seat, Mike Shay makes his first reunion appearance to talk about his struggles with addiction and Lala discusses the difficulties of being new. Jax, Schwartz and Sandoval delve into their wild trip to Las Vegas.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: The SUR staffers gather for a reunion installment. Here, James addresses notorious bite marks; Katie and Tom Schwartz talk about their proposal; Brittany reflects on how her life has changed; and Stassi tries to right some wrongs.

episodes.name: Reunion (3)
episodes.overview: Stassi clashes with Lisa Vanderpump over her handling of the sex tape, Ariana campaigns against Kristen's comedy career, Katie explains the return of `Tequila Katie', and James and Jax get into an argument that nearly ends in blows.

episodes.name: Secrets Revealed
episodes.overview: Never-before-seen footage includes the most embarrassing, revealing and hilarious scenes from season four.

episodes.name: Summer Bodies
episodes.overview: Lisa Vanderpump's SUR Restaurant is hotter than ever, but the conflict within her staff is at an all-time high when Jax jeopardizes the best relationship he's ever had. Stassi rallies the girls against James and Lala for fat shaming Katie, but Schwartz worries Stassi's return has brought out the worst in his fiancée. The group uncovers a bit of scandalous gossip.

episodes.name: What Went Down
episodes.overview: Lisa organizes a dog charity event with the help of the SUR staff and Katie on board as her assistant. Brittany threatens to leave Jax for spreading rumors of her, and James embarks on an "Apology Tour" for the horrible things he said to Scheana and Katie. Tom Schwartz asks for a pre-nuptial agreement.

episodes.name: Call It Like I See It
episodes.overview: Stassi, Scheana and Kristen are all asked to be a part of Katie's bridal party, but Ariana is left out in the cold as a result of her friendship with Lala. Meanwhile, Schwartz serves up Jax and Sandoval a spicy revenge for their years of hazing, and Katie questions Scheana's loyalty after spotting her getting cozy with Lala.

episodes.name: Thirsty Girls
episodes.overview: Scheana shuts down Lala's attempts at friendship in an effort to please Katie and her bridesmaids. Meanwhile, James is flying high when his pageant queen girlfriend comes to town for the summer, but the fun doesn't last after the new SUR hostess claims she slept with him. Later, Katie lashes out at Schwartz after learning he's secretly seeking therapy, causing him serious concern for the upcoming wedding. Finally, Jax eagerly watches as James puts his job at SUR in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Cold Feet
episodes.overview: Katie and Schwartz take a trip to scout their wedding venue, but when Schwartz shows signs of cold feet, Katie hits him below the belt. Meanwhile, Tom takes Ariana on a romantic date but discovers that he wants marriage and kids more than she does. Later, Scheana learns a scandalous rumor about Lala, while Lala learns two scandalous rumors about James. Finally, Lisa advises Katie to mend her relationship before the wedding.

episodes.name: Pride
episodes.overview: When terrorism strikes the Orlando gay community and threatens West Hollywood, Lisa puts her own safety aside to ride in the Pride Parade, rally SUR, and bring the community together. Meanwhile, Tom's jealousy over Ariana's bartending book sparks the nastiest fight of their relationship. Stassi plans a birthday trip to Montauk and James questions his friendship with Lala when the stories about her boyfriend continue to change.

episodes.name: The Sociopath Test
episodes.overview: Scheana and Kristen throw a surprise party for Shay and Carter, but Scheana gets surprised when Stassi and Katie attack her for sympathizing with Lala. Later, Jax reveals himself to be a certifiable sociopath on Stassi’s podcast. Finally, Lisa gives Brittany advice on how to deal with relationship jealousy, and Ariana stands up for Scheana.

episodes.name: No Show
episodes.overview: Scheana questions going on a birthday trip with Stassi and Katie following a vicious fight with them. Also, Lala begins to dread Ariana's Sonoma birthday getaway upon discovering she'll be stuck with Jax, and James pleads to get his DJ job back.

episodes.name: The Talk of Montauk
episodes.overview: Sandoval, Schwartz and Jax vow not to let Lala’s no-show ruin Ariana’s rowdy, NASCAR birthday weekend in Sonoma. Meanwhile, Stassi’s Montauk birthday trip is off to a rocky start when she breaks down in tears over her recent split, and Katie and Kristen fail to find Stassi an eligible Hamptons suitor. Later, Lisa learns troubling news about Lala’s situation, and Scheana feels like an outsider when she doesn’t embrace Stassi’s birthday traditions.

episodes.name: Summer House Rules
episodes.overview: Stassi continues her birthday trip at a Montauk clambake, where Katie finds Stassi potential new bachelors and Scheana and Kristen commit some seafood faux pas. Lala finally resurfaces to explain her disappearance, but Lisa isn't buying her wild lies. Ariana celebrates her birthday with Sandoval and Schwartz at a thrilling NASCAR race, but things grow tense after Jax disrespects Brittany. Later, Kristen, Katie and Scheana party at the Wirkus Twins' summer house, and sparks fly when Stassi finds herself alone in a hot tub with a handsome, young and successful New Yorker.

episodes.name: The D Pic
episodes.overview: Kristen upsets Brittany by using a picture of Jax's genitals in her comedy show. Meanwhile, Lala returns to SUR to apologize for missing Ariana's birthday, but Tom refuses to forgive her. Later, Brittany's mom arrives from Kentucky and puts the pressure on Jax to join a church and marry her daughter. Finally, Lisa surprises Katie with a risqué bridal shower gift and Ariana drops a bomb on Stassi, leaving her stunned.

episodes.name: Jax's Roast
episodes.overview: Sandoval decides to celebrate his birthday with a "Fund-Rager" to raise money for a good cause; Scheana accuses James of cheating; Kristen hosts a roast for Jax; Katie decides to get a medical marijuana card.

episodes.name: Ambush
episodes.overview: Schwartz tries to make peace between Ariana and Stassi, but Katie gets annoyed when Ariana refuses to play nice. Meanwhile, James is excited to play his biggest DJ set since being fired from SUR, but the gig is ruined when Jax, Scheana, Kristen and two alleged mistresses ambush James to expose his cheating ways. Finally, Lisa gives Katie valuable wedding advice and Schwartz gets his prenup, only to learn that he doesn't have much to protect.

episodes.name: Into The Closet
episodes.overview: Stassi gets some relationship advice from her little brother. Sandoval attempts to reignite his career by diving back into modeling and acting. Pandora throws Katie a spa day but things grow tense when Ariana refuses to apologize to Stassi and Katie's attacks brings Scheana to tears. Sandoval, Jax and Ariana raid Lisa's closet to fulfill Schwartz's dream of dressing in drag for his bachelor party.

episodes.name: Beads, Beers and Tears
episodes.overview: Scheana throws a pre-New Orleans pool party but when Tom and Katie's fighting reaches a new level, the group wonders if they should get married at all. Meanwhile, when Lisa allows James to DJ a party at PUMP James makes a play to get his old job back. Later, the bachelor/bachelorette party kicks off with plenty of Bourbon Street debauchery, but Sandoval stirs up trouble when he tells Katie she needs therapy. Finally, Stassi confronts Jax about his past mistakes resulting in tears from Jax and jealousy from Brittany.

episodes.name: Man Tears and Braziers
episodes.overview: A gator tour with Ariana and the groomsmen has some bite when talk turns to Schwartz's relationship troubles. Also: Kristen hires a female stripper while the men dress in drag; and Katie's anger toward Schwartz is addressed, leading to an all-out fight.

episodes.name: Drag Battle
episodes.overview: The epic New Orleans blowout continues, with Schwartz and Sandoval fiercely refuting the cheating accusations. Stassi realizes her past fights with Katie caused her to miss a painful moment when Katie needed her most. Kristen confronts Sandoval about trying to ruin her new relationship, and Stassi pays her dad and grandmother a visit. Katie and Schwartz bury their issues on a wild last night in Nola. Back in LA, Lisa talks to Ken about partnering up with Tom Sandoval to open a new bar.

episodes.name: Regrets Only
episodes.overview: Lisa declines to officiate Katie and Tom's wedding, which compels the couple to re-examine their entire relationship. Also: Stassi fumbles through her first blind date, and Lisa organizes a steamy SUR photo shoot, featuring Tom and Ariana wearing nothing but food.

episodes.name: Triple Trouble
episodes.overview: When Lala makes a surprise return to SUR, Lisa makes it clear that her behavior will no longer be tolerated. With Katie and Tom's wedding just days away, Jax and Sandoval arrange to fly in Schwartz's brothers as a surprise. Scheana announces her plan to have a baby despite her relationship issues with Shay, and Stassi poses for a nearly-nude photo shoot. Katie and Tom arrive at their wedding venue only to be greeted by a very large bill.

episodes.name: Taco Tuesday, Wedding Wednesday
episodes.overview: Katie and Tom's wedding is finally here and the whole group comes together to show their support. Jax and Tom give Schwartz the ultimate wedding surprise when they fly in his triplet brothers. Meanwhile, Stassi is moved to tears when she and Lisa finally bury the hatchet. Finally, Scheana insists her relationship with Shay is perfect, but Lisa suspects she may be hiding something

episodes.name: Introducing Mr. & Mrs. Schwartz
episodes.overview: Lisa officiates the ceremony that only Katie and Tom could pull off. Jax re-evaluates his relationship, and Ariana considers taking her relationship to the next step. Lisa offers the Toms the business opportunity of a lifetime, but Schwartz fears making two commitments in one day. Scheana reveals a secret about her marriage that will change her life.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Andy Cohen seeks the truth about the Kristen-and-Brittany hookup and Katie's attack on Schwartz's manhood; James addresses the cheating rumors; Lisa Vanderpump recalls celebrating Gay Pride in the wake of a tragedy; Lala makes an unexpected return.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: Andy Cohen talks to Lala about rumours she is dating a married man. Stassi's brother joins the reunion and Brittany expresses her anger with Kristen. Scheana confronts Katie about her drinking and Ariana calls Stassi out for being manipulative.

episodes.name: Reunion Part Three
episodes.overview: Andy Cohen finds out why Lisa initially refused to officiate Katie and Tom's wedding. James lashes out at Jax and Kristen, Ariana explains why she won't marry Sandoval, and Scheana shares an emotional moment with her estranged husband, Michael Shay.

episodes.name: Masquerade
episodes.overview: In the Season Six premiere, freshly divorced Scheana throws a lavish masquerade birthday party to show off her new boyfriend, but things get tense when she leaves Katie and Stassi off the guest list. Sandoval jeopardizes his and Schwartz's new restaurant partnership with Lisa when she overhears him complaining about her management style. Finally, a vicious rumor circulates that could destroy a relationship for good.

episodes.name: Unfaithful
episodes.overview: Brittany leaves Los Angeles after a painful revelation, leaving her relationship with Jax in question; Stassi reconnects with her ex-boyfriend Patrick; James tries to reclaim his DJ job at SUR; Lisa serves as grand marshal of a gay pride parade.

episodes.name: Back In The Saddle
episodes.overview: Brittany's girlfriends put aside their differences and throw a Kentucky-themed party to help cure her heartache, but the group learns Jax's indiscretion may not have been a one-time thing. When Ariana gets thrown off of her horse during practice, she must learn how to get back in the saddle. Lala returns to SUR to ask for Lisa's forgiveness—and her old job.

episodes.name: Absinthe-minded
episodes.overview: As Lala drops a bombshell, Schwartz and Sandoval try to prove their commitment to partnering with Lisa Vanderpump by making a big investment. Meanwhile, Stassi struggles as SUR's new event planner, and Jax and James forge an unlikely friendship.

episodes.name: Sex, Lies & Audiotape
episodes.overview: A devastating audio recording surfaces at Brittany's housewarming party. While Lisa and Katie take Schwartz to task after his latest drunken blackout, Ariana reveals the heartbreaking reason for her body image struggles.

episodes.name: See You Next Tuesday
episodes.overview: Ariana's role in releasing Jax's scandalous audio recording leads to a fight with Sandoval. Scheana and Katie declare a truce. At SUR, James hustles to make sure his first DJ event is a success, while Lala bonds with Billie, the new hostess.

episodes.name: It's Not About The Pasta
episodes.overview: Scheana spirals out of control when she suspects Rob is pulling away, forcing Lisa to come to her rescue. Stassi assists in dressing the staff for SUR's annual Gay Pride celebration, while James erupts on Lala after she insults his girlfriend. Jax turns to an unlikely form of therapy in order to come to terms with his anger and infidelity.

episodes.name: Best Mates
episodes.overview: Kristen tests Jax's patience when she flies out Brittany's mom for a visit, especially when it turns out that she has another surprise up her sleeve. Lala finds her inner feminist and schemes to repair Scheana and Katie's friendship, Lisa rewards Peter for years of loyal service, and a salacious rumor about James and his best friend makes the rounds at SUR.

episodes.name: Call Me Jason
episodes.overview: Stassi helps organize a party to honor Lisa Vanderpump’s new role at Beverly Hills Lifestyle magazine, but struggles to convince her bitter ex-coworkers to lend a hand; Schwartz’s triplet brothers come for a visit and a Tom Sandoval makeover; Jax’s anger issues send him running back to reiki therapy; Katie finds herself the victim of body-shaming comments; and Lisa must find a way to reopen SUR after a fire nearly puts the restaurant permanently out of commission.

episodes.name: Screams and Queens
episodes.overview: Ariana shines as the belle of the ball, while an embarrassed Stassi runs off in tears; Schwartz and Sandoval celebrate the approval of TomTom's permits by writing hefty checks; Sandoval and Ariana work through their intimacy issues.

episodes.name: It's All Happening
episodes.overview: Lisa channels all her energy into restoring SUR after the devastating fire. On the heels of her birthday meltdown, Stassi consults a tarot card reader about her future with Patrick, while Scheana invites a select group of friends to visit Rob's prized cabin in Big Bear. James makes a startling admission about his feelings for with Lala, and Jax feels left behind in the wake of Tom and Tom's success.

episodes.name: Wishful Sinking
episodes.overview: Jax cheats death when an attempt to show off goes horribly wrong; Raquel questions whether James still harbors romantic feelings for Lala; Ariana gets upset when Sandoval does not invite her on a business trip; Stassi interviews Lisa for her podcast.

episodes.name: Vegas! Baby?
episodes.overview: Lisa takes Sandoval and Schwartz on a business trip to Las Vegas to design their new bar, but when the guys focus more on partying than professionalism, Lisa questions the whole partnership. Meanwhile in Vegas, Brittany tells Katie and Ariana she needs to take a pregnancy test, and everyone is shocked by Jax's reaction to the results. Back in L.A., Lala reaches out to former frenemy, Stassi, to help plan her debut musical event, and Stassi urges Lala to confront the wildcard that could sabotage her performance, James Kennedy.

episodes.name: Watch Your Back
episodes.overview: Jax shows his lack of maturity when confronted with a reminder of his infidelity; Scheana sets Brittany up with SUR's hottest new bartender; Ariana's brother asks out new SUR hostess Billie Lee; James has an emotional reunion with his father.

episodes.name: Nothing Here for Me
episodes.overview: Jax blindsides Brittany with the news that he is considering moving to Florida for a job. Sandoval and Schwartz impress Lisa by creating innovative cocktails for TomTom. Stassi and Lala take Jax to task for always putting his needs above Brittany's.

episodes.name: Sur Going South
episodes.overview: The Mexico adventure continues as the group explores a natural water park and the nightlife in Playa del Carmen; James tries to remain in Jax's favor by exposing Scheana's role in hooking up Brittany with the hot new bartender's assistant.

episodes.name: The Smoking Gun
episodes.overview: The Playa del Carmen party continues as James takes over the DJ booth at a Mexican club, and Jax confronts Scheana for setting up Brittany with another man. Meanwhile, Lisa adopts a new dog, Schwartz horrifies Katie with a drunken blackout, Stassi realizes her relationship is in trouble, and the rumor mill works overtime when exes Kristen and James share a night on the beach.

episodes.name: Karma's a Bitch
episodes.overview: After returning to Los Angeles, Kristen must inform her boyfriend about the night she spent with James; Sandoval persuades Lisa to throw a progress party to show off the TomTom space; Jax deals with Brittany's admirer.

episodes.name: Reiki Breaky Heart
episodes.overview: Ariana and Brittany seek relationship advice from Lisa, while Stassi throws a party to relaunch Katie's beauty blog. Kristen's boyfriend Carter questions Sandoval about her night in Mexico with James. Katie and Tom celebrate their first wedding anniversary, while Jax and Brittany's relationship takes a surprising turn.

episodes.name: Lost Cause
episodes.overview: After a painful breakup, Brittany bounces back with new swagger, a new outlook, and her sights set on a new man. Lisa gives Stassi relationship advice. Lala takes the stage with James for the biggest musical performance of her career.

episodes.name: Welcome to TomTom
episodes.overview: Sandoval and Schwartz give their friends a sneak peek at TomTom, but a cloud hangs over the party as Lisa must decide Jax's future at SUR. Stassi introduces Lisa to her boyfriend with awkward results. Brittany unleashes pent up anger at Jax.

episodes.name: Reunion - Part 1
episodes.overview: Host Andy Cohen uncovers the real stories behind the scenes; Lisa Vanderpump sets Sandoval and Schwartz straight on their roles at TomTom; Jax shares the heartbreaking details of his father's passing; Ariana opens up about her body issues.

episodes.name: Reunion - Part 2
episodes.overview: Andy recaps Katie and Schwartz's roller coaster first year of marriage. The group questions Jax's relationship with his reiki healer. Lala reveals more about her mysterious boyfriend. Billie Lee joins and opens up about life as a transgender woman.

episodes.name: Reunion (3)
episodes.overview: Andy explores Jax's epic meltdown at SUR and his decision to break up with Brittany; Lala and James examine the intermittent flirting and fighting in their relationship; Katie and Schwartz discuss the prospect of having children.

episodes.name: Secrets Revealed
episodes.overview: A look at never-before-seen footage of `Vanderpump Rules.'

episodes.name: A Decent Proposal
episodes.overview: Lisa Vanderpump finds herself behind schedule on TomTom, the new bar she’s opening with Tom Sandoval and Tom Schwartz. James lands in hot water with the group after insulting Brittany. Scheana settles into single life. Jax proposes to Brittany.

episodes.name: Hope and Pride
episodes.overview: Stassi plans a surprise party to celebrate Jax and Brittany's engagement; James tries to work his way back into the group's good graces; Stassi seeks Lisa's approval for her new beau, Beau.

episodes.name: Either Him or Me
episodes.overview: Schwartz takes James to task for insulting Katie, and Scheana feels threatened by Stassi and Ariana's newfound friendship. When Katie is the victim of body-shaming comments, she gives Lisa Vanderpump an ultimatum that will send reverberations throughout the SUR community.

episodes.name: Lisa's Dilemma
episodes.overview: Katie's ultimatum forces Lisa Vanderpump to reconsider employing James at SUR; Tom Schwartz and Tom Sandoval display different methods of interviewing staff members for TomTom; Jax and Brittany host a dinner party to debut their beer cheese.

episodes.name: Ice Queens
episodes.overview: Stassi and Ariana throw an epic winter-themed birthday party; Stassi's new boyfriend gets his first taste of Stassi's bad birthday behavior; Jax confronts Tom Sandoval for questioning his engagement; James finds himself cut off from everyone at SUR.

episodes.name: Love Thy Mother
episodes.overview: Stassi struggles to make amends with Beau after her meltdown; James tries to rekindle his friendship with Lala; Jax causes trouble at a SUR staff meeting; the Toms present their cocktails to Lisa; Katie, Kristen and Stassi's mothers come to town.

episodes.name: Girls' Night In
episodes.overview: Katie convinces Lisa to let her host a "Girls' Night In" party, but Billie Lee lashes out at Katie for not including her in the planning; Brittany throws a tantrum; Lala decides James is moving too fast; Stassi creates her own personal holiday.

episodes.name: A Housewarming Divided
episodes.overview: The group treks to Marina del Rey for Scheana's housewarming; Lala calls out Billie Lee; Tom gossips about Ariana's romantic encounters with women; Lisa Vanderpump finally reveals the fully finished TomTom to a giddy Sandoval and Schwartz.

episodes.name: Tom and Tommer
episodes.overview: Sandoval and Schwartz scramble to get TomTom ready for its opening event; Kristen learns she's not allowed to come; James erupts when Raquel considers attending Girls' Night In; Jax celebrates his first birthday without the support of his parents.

episodes.name: So Vain in Solvang
episodes.overview: Lala takes her friends to Solvang, Calif., on a private jet; Jax looks forward to a guys' night out with Tom Sandoval and Tom Schwartz; Brittany brings Jax to therapy to deal with his infidelities; James has a fight with his mother over money.

episodes.name: Return of Crazy Kristen
episodes.overview: Kristen's bizarre behavior threatens to spoil the women's trip to wine country; Scheana breaks down; James is overjoyed when he gets a last-minute invitataion to the guys' "staycation;" Tom Sandoval invites women back to the hotel room.

episodes.name: PJs on the PJ
episodes.overview: Stassi gives Kristen tough love about her relationship with Carter; Sandoval and Schwartz worry that Lisa may not put their cocktails on the menu; Lisa gives James permission to DJ an event at PUMP; Lala is betrayed by her boyfriend of three years.

episodes.name: Reptilian Brain
episodes.overview: Stassi desperately wants to make a good impression when she first meets Beau's mom, but her hopes are dashed; Sandoval and Ariana finally have an honest discussion about having kids; Jax dotes on Brittany after her dental surgery.

episodes.name: Tom vs. Tom
episodes.overview: The Toms plan a Puerto Vallarta vacation for their friends, but Katie explodes on Sandoval when she learns they've also invited James Kennedy; Kristen and Carter share an awkward dinner on their anniversary; Lisa Vanderpump doles out wisdom.

episodes.name: Trouble in Lala-land
episodes.overview: Still grieving over her father, Lala breaks down and lashes out at James, Raquel and Billie Lee; Lisa, Sandoval and Schwartz throw all their effort into preparing TomTom for the grand opening; Jax complains about his upcoming engagement party.

episodes.name: I Don't Like the Sound of Your Voice
episodes.overview: On the day of TomTom's official opening party, Sandoval surprises Schwartz with a grand gesture; Lisa confronts Lala about her behavior at brunch; Katie sees the group's vacation to Mexico as a chance to reconnect with her busy husband.

episodes.name: Fomo in Mexico
episodes.overview: As the Mexico trip continues, Stassi unleashes her insecurities on Beau. Ariana attempts to show Lala the error of her mean girl ways. Lisa oversees TomTom's first dinner service, and Jax dredges up old accusations against Kristen.

episodes.name: End of an Era
episodes.overview: In Mexico, Lala's decision to return to drinking leads to a panic attack, and Tom Schwartz finds a unique way to rekindle the romance with Katie. Elsewhere, Stassi and Beau try to repair their relationship, and Lisa ponders firing a staff member.

episodes.name: The Exorcism of Stassi Schroeder
episodes.overview: Tom Schwartz finds a way to make good on his financial obligation to Lisa; Stassi visits a witch to exorcise the demons threatening her relationship; Lala stages a musical performance; Jax reveals some troubling issues during couple's therapy.

episodes.name: Brittany and the Beast
episodes.overview: Scheana goes out with a model in an attempt to make Adam jealous; James accuses Lala of being insincere; Brittany's big Kentucky family descends on West Hollywood in preparation for the engagement party; Jax puts his foot in his mouth.

episodes.name: Rules of Engagement
episodes.overview: Brittany's fairy-tale theme party takes a turn when her father expresses doubts about his future son-in-law. Ariana confronts Lisa Vanderpump about not respecting Tom and Tom as business partners. Finally, the simmering tensions between Scheana and Adam boil over after Scheana reveals she's been with another guy.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Host Andy Cohen sits down with the SUR gang to discuss Brittany's engagement, the rap that ended James' friendship with Jax and the trials and tribulations of Tom and Tom's first year in business; Jax and James go head to head over allegations.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: Lala and James argue over the demise of their friendship; Katie defends her ultimatum to Lisa Vanderpump; Ariana and Lala reveal the steamy details of their backseat hookup; Billie Lee dishes on her secret hook-up with another cast member.

episodes.name: Reunion (3)
episodes.overview: Stassi and Katie argue with Kristen over her tumultuous relationship with Carter; Jax answers for his bad behavior toward Brittany's family; Stassi's boyfriend, Beau, opens up about their dramatic fights in Mexico; Tom Schwartz defends his manhood.

episodes.name: There Goes the Neighborhood
episodes.overview: Jax, Brittany, Schwartz, Katie, Sandoval, and Ariana move into grown-up houses; Stassi tries to repair her friendship with Kristen; Lala confides in Lisa Vanderpump; Max dates the new hostess, Dayna; Tom Sandoval skips one of Jax's wedding events.

episodes.name: Training Days
episodes.overview: When new server Dayna starts dating Max, Scheana makes Dayna's life difficult; Stassi, Katie and Brittany are bothered by Kristen's ties to Carter; Jax un-invites Carter from the trip to Miami; Lala and James come to terms; Ariana opens up to Lisa.

episodes.name: Next Level Rage Texts
episodes.overview: Stassi throws a book party at TomTom but excludes Tom Sandoval from the planning; Sandoval rage texts her, leading to an epic explosion between them and forcing Tom Schwartz to pick sides; Scheana bonds with Charli over their mutual dislike of Dayna.

episodes.name: “Don’t Do It, Brittany”
episodes.overview: When the group heads to Miami, Beau confronts Sandoval for attacking Stassi at her book signing; Ariana accuses Schwartz of not pulling his weight at TomTom; Brittany has a meltdown triggered by an unexpected reminder of Jax's infidelity.

episodes.name: Grumpy Old Men
episodes.overview: Jax and Brittany's dual bachelor/bachelorette trip charges on as Sandoval, Schwartz, Jax, and Beau plan a surprise disguise for the girls, while Stassi finds herself caught in the middle of a friendship-ending fight between Katie and Kristen.

episodes.name: Your Pride's Showing
episodes.overview: Stassi, Katie and Lala throw Brittany a princess-themed bridal shower, while James gets disinvited from Peter's birthday party and Lisa takes Raquel to task for walking out on her shift during Pride.

episodes.name: It's Not About the Pastor
episodes.overview: Stassi, Katie and Lala throw Brittany a princess-themed bridal shower, while James gets disinvited from Peter's birthday party and Lisa takes Raquel to task for walking out on her shift during Pride.

episodes.name: Ex-Best Man, Ex-Best Friend
episodes.overview: Ariana pushes Lala and Stassi away as she spirals into a dark place, Scheana sabotages Brett and Charli's date and Lisa receives some devastating news.

episodes.name: If You’re Going to Drink, I Can’t Stop You
episodes.overview: With the wedding just days away, Jax must choose whether or not to forgive Tom, while Ariana struggles to find the excitement to attend her own birthday party; Katie and Kristen argue over whether Carter should go to the wedding.

episodes.name: Jax's Last Hurrah
episodes.overview: On the eve of Jax and Brittany's wedding, the rehearsal is disrupted when Stassi, Katie and Lala clash with Kristen; Jax tells a juicy secret about Katie and Schwartz's marriage.

episodes.name: Introducing Mr. and Mrs. Cauchi
episodes.overview: Jax and Brittany wed in a stylish Kentucky ceremony surrounded by friends, while Stassi wonders if Beau will ever propose to her; Lisa brings Katie and Schwartz to task for failing to make their marriage official.

episodes.name: All Daugs Go to Heaven
episodes.overview: Tom Sandoval throws an extra themed birthday party; Stassi and Katie learn they must work with Kristen; Max tries to ban Danica from TomTom; Tom Schwartz hosts an unusual memorial for his dead lizard, Daug.

episodes.name: Prank Wars
episodes.overview: Brett insults Scheana, and Katie hosts a girls' night that doesn't include Kristen. Lisa travels home to England to attend her mother's funeral. Meanwhile, Tom Sandoval and Max toilet paper Jax's house in honour of his 40th birthday.

episodes.name: Shame Hangover
episodes.overview: Schwartz makes amends with Katie after their blowout fight, while Beau opens up to them about his plans to propose to Stassi. Lisa reprimands Danica about improving her attitude, Kristen learns she isn’t invited to Las Vegas for Schwartz and Katie’s second wedding, and Brett sets his sights on a newly single Dayna, despite Scheana’s emotional objections.

episodes.name: Mr. & Mrs. Schwartz Take Two
episodes.overview: The group travels to Las Vegas to celebrate Schwartz and Katie's second wedding, but leave a heartbroken Kristen behind; Lisa shows off the Vanderpump Cocktail Garden; Beau calls Stassi's father to ask permission to propose.

episodes.name: Witches of Weho Whine
episodes.overview: Lisa helps Beau plan a secret engagement party for Stassi, but Stassi's insecurities threaten everything when she explodes at a wine event; Lala and James make music together; Danica takes Brett to task; Scheana presents Dayna with an unwanted gift.

episodes.name: Til Death Do Us Not Part
episodes.overview: Beau stuns Stassi with a quirky but romantic engagement proposal; Danica and the SUR staff go head-to-head with Sandoval, Schwartz, and the team from TomTom during an epic softball game to determine restaurant dominance.

episodes.name: Mercury's in Gatorade
episodes.overview: Stassi and Beau revel in their post-engagement bliss, while Scheana enlists Brett to a shoot a sexy video; Brittany must again answer for Jax's bad behavior when he lashes out at Max, and Raquel tries to persuade Lisa to give James one last chance.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Pool Parties
episodes.overview: Tom Sandoval throws a competing pool party on the same day as Jax, forcing everyone to choose sides once and for all; Brittany blames Katie for the rift in their friendship, while Max and Brett nearly come to blows over their feelings for Dayna.

episodes.name: Unfriended
episodes.overview: In the eighth season finale, Lisa Vanderpump throws a party to celebrate TomTom's one-year anniversary, but relationships are tested when Kristen confronts Katie and Stassi for abandoning her, and Jax and Sandoval face off.

episodes.name: Secrets Revealed
episodes.overview: In never-before-seen moments, Scheana and Stassi bond over their dislike of threesomes, while Dayna and Charli nearly come to blows; Jax explains to Brittany why he can never be left alone with their future kids.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Andy Cohen and the cast connect from home to get to the bottom of everything that occurred in the eighth season.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: The shocking reunion continues as Andy Cohen gets Scheana to open up about her true problems with Dayna, and Ariana reveals how Lisa Vanderpump helped her through dark depression. Meanwhile, James and Raquel recount his triumphant journey to sobriety.

episodes.name: Reunion (3)
episodes.overview: The reunion continues with Andy Cohen interviewing the cast about the season’s controversies. Among things talked about includes the issues that fractured the decade-long friendship of Kristen, Stassi, and Katie.

episodes.name: We're Back Baby
episodes.overview: We're Back, BabyIn the ninth season premiere, Scheana and Lala attempt to mend their friendship after an explosive public feud, while James must answer to Lisa Vanderpump for lashing out at her son; The Toms hatch a plan to open their own bar.

episodes.name: The Schwartz Shuffle
episodes.overview: Schwartz comes clean about pitting Katie against Sandoval, while Ariana confides in Lisa Vanderpump about her deep-seated issues with Lala. Sandoval helps James plan an epic vacation to Palm Springs so he can propose to Raquel, but Randall's beef with Schwartz and Lala's feuds with Ariana and Charli threaten to derail the trip.

episodes.name: Welcome to Rachella!
episodes.overview: Schwartz tries to regain his confidence at Lala and Randall's pickleball tournament, while Raquel is forced to face her biggest fear; Scheana and Lala share a baby play date.

episodes.name: Palm Springs and Tiffany Rings
episodes.overview: Sandoval goes the extra mile to help Schwartz produce his fertility specimen, while Lala expresses concerns to Scheana over Brock's sordid past; James and Raquel host a family engagement dinner.

episodes.name: Drink the Tea, Spill the Tea
episodes.overview: James encourages Raquel to confront her biggest bully, while Katie and Schwartz consult a fertility doctor about their chances of conceiving. Lisa Vanderpump hosts an elegant tea party at Villa Rosa so she can meet Scheana and Lala’s babies, but the afternoon is turned upside down when Lala exposes a dark new secret about Brock’s character.

episodes.name: Poker Faces
episodes.overview: Lala comes under fire during a girls' night for continuing to question Scheana's relationship, while Brock must answer to Lisa Vanderpump after the darkness in his past is revealed. Raquel takes James to a boxing class to work on his anger, Randall hosts a poker night for the guys, and Lisa offers to buy Tom Schwartz's stake in TomTom so he can afford to invest in his new bar.

episodes.name: Anger Mismanagement
episodes.overview: Schwartz and Sandoval brainstorm ideas for their bar, while Raquel comes clean to Lisa about the story behind her nose job, much to James’ dismay. Charli excludes Lala from her party in solidarity with Scheana, and when everyone parties too hard for James' comfort, he lashes out at his unsuspecting fianceé.

episodes.name: Pitch Not-So-Perfect
episodes.overview: Katie makes a splash at Schwartz and Sandoval’s pitch meeting, much to Sandoval's dismay, while Ariana coaches Raquel on how to set boundaries with James. Lala finally makes amends with Scheana after their rift, but Brock and Charli aren't so quick to forgive and forget.

episodes.name: It’s a Mad, Mad Pool Party
episodes.overview: Scheana struggles to accept her post-baby body, while James sets a new goal for himself as his two-year sobriety anniversary approaches. Ariana and Sandoval throw a wild pool party to celebrate Brock’s birthday, but when Sandoval and Katie clash over the future of the bar, Lala confronts Schwartz for failing to have his wife's back.

episodes.name: Sexy Unique Feet
episodes.overview: Ariana, Katie, and Charli get creative with a photoshoot to help raise money for Raquel's second nose job, while Scheana gets annoyed at James for refusing to help out with Brock's new fitness app, and Schwartz must pay up when he loses a bet to Lisa Vanderpump. Lala and Ariana show their support for Katie after she's ousted from the Toms' new bar, and when Raquel hosts a tea party for her friends, things go awry after Charli confronts Scheana for being a bad friend.

episodes.name: Best Friends For Never
episodes.overview: Sandoval plans a mysterious surprise for Ariana’s 36th birthday, while Katie seeks advice from Lisa after a blowout fight at TomTom. Brock encourages Scheana to stick up for herself with Charli, Lala hires a personal assistant to help with her business, and a usually happy couple decides to take a “break” from their relationship.

episodes.name: Give Them Lala
episodes.overview: Katie and Ariana decide to go into business together, while Brock enlists Randall’s help in planning a romantic surprise for Scheana, and Lala celebrates her fiscal independence by throwing a party for her beauty brand. Meanwhile, James must battle his controlling impulses when Raquel’s sister suggests a bachelorette party for the future bride but finds it hard to keep his opinions to himself.

episodes.name: Unprogressive Party
episodes.overview: Schwartz and Sandoval throw a progress party to show off their new bar to their friends; Lisa, Ariana and Katie brainstorm ideas for their sandwich shop; Scheana embraces signing a prenuptial; Brock's attempt to hold James accountable backfires.

episodes.name: Between a Brock and a Hard Place
episodes.overview: Ariana and Katie meet with Randall about investing in their sandwich shop, while Sandoval gets cold feet about helping Brock with his latest scheme to marry Scheana. Still reeling from James’ latest outburst, the gang heads north to a beautiful winery in Santa Ynez to celebrate James and Raquel’s engagement, but everyone worries which version of the DJ they're going to get.

episodes.name: Engagement Party Crashers
episodes.overview: On the eve of Raquel and James' engagement party, Scheana and Brock make a big announcement that sends shock waves through their friend group, and Sandoval confronts Lisa about her lack of support for the Toms' new bar.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Raquel and James make a jaw-dropping announcement that shakes their friends to the core, while Sandoval and Katie clash over their control issues about the bar and Tom Schwartz.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: Brock and Scheana defend their plan to get married during James and Raquel's engagement weekend; Lala spills secrets about the end of her relationship with Randall, and Ariana unleashes on Katie for questioning her integrity.

episodes.name: Breaking Bubbas
episodes.overview: Katie and Schwartz attempt to maintain a friendship in the wake of their recent divorce; James introduces his new girlfriend Ally to the rest of the group; tensions between Schwartz and Lala bubble over when one of them commits an act of betrayal.

episodes.name: Was It Worth It?
episodes.overview: Raquel cozies up to Peter in an attempt to get over James; Lala opens up about the origins of her last relationship; James throws Raquel under the bus to Lisa; Katie comes face to face with the bar that led to the demise of her marriage.

episodes.name: Troll Mates
episodes.overview: Lala drops a bombshell on Raquel that shakes the foundation of their newfound friendship; Sandoval takes some time away from the bar to play rock star with his cover band; Ariana and Katie take the next step in opening their sandwich shop.

episodes.name: No Home Left to Wreck
episodes.overview: James finds himself at the center of the rumor mill when he gets kicked out of a nightclub while fighting with Ally; Katie tries to keep her ex in line with another ultimatum; Tom and Tom host a friends-and-family event at Schwartz and Sandy's.

episodes.name: Lovestruck at the Discopussy
episodes.overview: Katie plans a divorce party trip to Las Vegas and Lake Havasu but conveniently leaves Scheana off the guest list; Lala and Raquel find themselves flirting with the same guy; Ariana receives devastating news from home.

episodes.name: Divorce Party Crashers
episodes.overview: Lala and Katie freak out at Raquel for making out with Oliver; Scheana plans a guy's night to help Schwartz get back in the game; Tom and Tom weigh a big decision about the future of their bar; Lisa consoles Ariana about her loss.

episodes.name: Galaxy Gaslighting
episodes.overview: James starts to spiral when he feels that his friends are choosing Raquel over him; Lala breaks her yearslong dry spell when she hooks up with a new guy; Katie and Scheana clash over a hotel room snafu.

episodes.name: By Invitation Only
episodes.overview: Lisa and Ariana plan a surprise bridal shower for Scheana; James makes it his mission to score Ally an invitation to the wedding; Raquel and Schwartz take their flirting to the next level; the group travels to Cancun to celebrate Brock and Scheana.

episodes.name: Forbidden Fruit
episodes.overview: Katie and Schwartz celebrate a milestone in their breakup with an extravagant dinner that quickly goes south; Scheana erupts on Lala for skipping wedding events to avoid Raquel; James must atone for his behavior when his temper gets the best of him.

episodes.name: It's All Happening... Again
episodes.overview: Scheana and Brock marry in a lavish ceremony in Cancun; James and Katie must sort through their feelings after their exes hook up with one another; Lisa attempts to solve the Toms' problems; Lala puts Raquel in her place.

episodes.name: Mistress in Distress
episodes.overview: Back in Los Angeles, Lala celebrated her birthday with an epic party; Raquel sets her sights on Oliver after being rejected by Schwartz; Tom and Ariana discuss their plans to make embryos together; Ally and James witness a suspicious interaction.

episodes.name: Beach, Don't Kill My Vibe
episodes.overview: Sandoval opens up to Schwartz about his romantic problems with Ariana; Scheana blames Katie for spreading a sordid rumor about some of their friends; Ariana suffers another big loss; James plans an epic beach day that takes a turn for the worse.

episodes.name: Lady and the Glamp
episodes.overview: Raquel's birthday dreams come true when she embarks on a glamping trip with some of her closest friends; Lala grows suspicious about Sandoval's interest in Raquel; James and Ally attempt to work out their issues following a disastrous beach day.

episodes.name: There's Something About Her
episodes.overview: Ariana and Katie host a preview party for their sandwich shop; James takes an exciting step forward in his career; Tom and Ariana have a serious talk about the state of their relationship; Raquel confronts Katie for rage-texting Schwartz.

episodes.name: #Scandoval
episodes.overview: Cameras pick back up after Ariana discovers that her boyfriend of nine years is having an affair with one of her best friends; Schwartz panics when the scandal threatens to upend their business; Sandoval comes clean with another shocking secret.

episodes.name: Reunion (1)
episodes.overview: Andy Cohen sits down for intimate one-on-one interviews with Ariana, Tom and Raquel to get to the bottom of the cheating scandal; James nearly comes to blows with Sandoval over the affair; Katie and Schwartz rehash the implosion of their divorce.

episodes.name: Reunion (2)
episodes.overview: Lisa and the SUR staff open up about their issues with Stassi; Tom Sandoval and Ariana confront Kristen over Miami Girl; Tom Schwartz responds to Katie's marriage ultimatum; Stassi reveals the real reason she is no longer friends with Scheana.

episodes.name: Reunion (3)
episodes.overview: Raquel faces her former friends; the group revisits the disastrous girls' trip to Las Vegas and Lake Havasu; they discuss Tom Schwartz's alleged role in covering up the affair; Andy questions Sandoval and Raquel about their relationship.

episodes.name: Secrets Revealed
episodes.overview: A deeper glimpse into the fallout of the group post-#Scandoval; never-before-seen moments from the summer shed a new light on glaring secrets that have since been revealed; Tom and Katie face the reality of their divorce while still living together.

episodes.name: Notes on a Scandal
episodes.overview: In the season 11 premiere, Ariana puts on a brave face and attempts to rebuild her life after Tom’s infidelity, despite sharing a house with her ex-boyfriend. Tom Schwartz tries to make peace with his friends, but discovers he’s still excommunicated from the group. James settles into his new life of domestic bliss with Ally. Scheana opens up about her postpartum OCD diagnosis. Lala confides in Lisa Vanderpump about her regrettable treatment of a one-time nemesis, making a grand gesture that threatens to rock the boat with her friends.

episodes.name: The Ultimate Betrayal
episodes.overview: Tom Sandoval returns to Los Angeles just in time for his birthday. His plans hit a snag, however, when Ariana learns he wants to throw a party in their shared home. Scheana attempts to reinvigorate her music career, but must first work through her anxiety about leaving Summer Moon with a nanny. Schwartz confronts Sandoval for abandoning him to deal with their business alone.

episodes.name: You're Not the Queen of the Group
episodes.overview: Schwartz hatches a half-baked scheme to bring the gang back together, but Ariana sets firm boundaries with everyone regarding her ex-boyfriend’s place in the group. Katie and Scheana make a promise to prioritize their friendship. A shocking admission shakes Lisa Vanderpump to the core. When Tom Sandoval dares to show up at See You Next Tuesday, he and Scheana square off about who’s to blame for their current rift.

episodes.name: Dog Days of Summer
episodes.overview: James and Ally throw their first pool party in their new house, and the invite list includes everyone but Tom Sandoval. Lisa Vanderpump gives Scheana and Lala advice on how to handle a broken friendship. Schwartz gets a haircut from his not-girlfriend, Jo. A face from the past makes an unexpected return, promising to throw a wrench into the group dynamic.

episodes.name: Lake It or Break It
episodes.overview: James surprises Ally with a new addition to the family. Scheana and Brock clash over hiring a nanny for Summer Moon. Although Katie and Ariana refuse to attend Schwartz’s trip to Lake Tahoe, the rest of the group agrees to give the adventure a shot. After a tour of Lisa Vanderpump’s new restaurant site, a tense conversation between James and Sandoval threatens to rock the fragile peace the group had just formed.

episodes.name: Saw It on the Graham
episodes.overview: Sandoval attempts to reconnect with Scheana during a meditation exercise, which sends Scheana into a tailspin. Brock accuses a friend of spreading a vicious rumor about his marriage. James and Ally announce their new family member to the world. Ariana and Katie embrace their inner bosses when they interview potential employees for their sandwich shop. Lala’s attempts at closure erupt in a heated screaming match.

episodes.name: Written in the Stars
episodes.overview: With the trip to Lake Tahoe in the rearview mirror, the group begins to mend their friendships, much to Ariana and Katie’s dismay. Lala expresses her desire to become a mother again without the aid of a romantic partner. Scheana cries to Lisa about her insecurities with Ariana. Sandoval is forced to recognize he may never get closure with the woman he loves. Ally hosts an astrology night to help the girls bond, but some refuse to play nice.

episodes.name: Peaks and Valleys
episodes.overview: Katie and Lala hash out their issues after a blowout argument. Sandoval throws himself back into the dating pool with awkward results. Ariana warns Scheana about the consequences of rekindling a friendship with Sandoval. Brock expresses a desire to find out what’s next in his career. Schwartz organizes a guys’ night with an old friend to help Sandoval move past his issues, but doesn’t plan for their checkered past to rear its ugly head.

episodes.name: Kiss Kiss, Revenge Bang
episodes.overview: Schwartz makes a startling revelation to Lala about a past hookup that sends Katie spiraling. James hosts a DJ night at Hotel Ziggy, but when Schwartz brings non-girlfriend Jo, the other girls give her the cold shoulder. Ariana and Katie encounter new issues in opening their sandwich shop. Brock drops a bombshell about a more recent liaison that shocks the entire group.

episodes.name: Line in the Sand
episodes.overview: Lala hosts a water-tasting event to expand her friends’ horizons, but the evening quickly devolves into a battle of exes when Schwartz confronts Katie for her recent hookup. Ariana takes Sandoval to task for an irresponsible mishap. James draws a literal line in the sand during a trip to the beach. Tensions boil over when Tom and Ariana clash about long-simmering resentments.

episodes.name: May the Best Woman Win
episodes.overview: After a disastrous fight at the beach, Ariana finally breaks down over the end of her relationship with Tom. Katie and Schwartz vie for the affections of the same woman. Lala confides in Scheana and Ally about her issues with a close friend. Sandoval and Schwartz attend a singles event, but things go awry when Jo sees Schwartz kissing another girl.

episodes.name: How'd You Like Them Apples?
episodes.overview: Just when it seems the group is on the road to healing, a podcast rehashing the past sends everyone spiraling. Scheana turns her pain into lyrics by releasing a new song. Lala takes the next step toward expanding her family. Ally and James have a tough conversation about the next steps in their relationship. When everyone comes together to celebrate TomTom’s first brunch service, Scheana and Sandoval clash over a perceived betrayal.

episodes.name: Jax Attack
episodes.overview: James hosts a brunch at SUR with former frenemy Jax that stirs up trouble when he neglects to get permission from Lisa Vanderpump. Scheana and Brock confide in their friends about their marriage woes. Schwartz and Katie take another step forward in their post-divorce relationship. Ariana invites her boyfriend, Dan, on the group’s upcoming trip to San Francisco. Katie is accused of spreading cheating rumors about Jax. Scheana’s attempt to apologize to Sandoval goes south when he throws a past indiscretion in her face.

episodes.name: For Old Tom's Sake
episodes.overview: Lala celebrates her 33rd birthday with a sexy burlesque party; Ariana and Katie give Lisa an update on the status of Something About Her; Schwartz reconnects with Jo after their friendship breakup; Schwartz makes Katie an indecent proposal.

episodes.name: Plot Twist
episodes.overview: Scheana performs live for the first time with her band; Katie clashes with Jo over a year's worth of grievances; Ariana takes Dan to lunch with her friends; the fourth wall is left shattered when Tom approaches Ariana for a conversation.

episodes.name: Reunion Part 1
episodes.overview: Sandoval defends his poor decisions when he gets called out in the press; Ariana builds a life on Broadway with her new boyfriend, but questions remain about the shared house in L.A., Scheana and Brock discuss the turbulence in their marriage.

episodes.name: Reunion Part 2
episodes.overview: Andy Cohen presses Scheana and Schwartz for details on their secret makeout in Vegas; Ariana opens up about the disconnect she felt with Scheana; Katie makes a surprising revelation about her revenge bang with Schwartz's best friend.

episodes.name: Reunion Part 3
episodes.overview: Ariana breaks her no contact rule with Sandoval, leaving both in tears; Scheana defends her actions and suggests her rift with Ariana started well before the summer; Katie blames Sandoval for the downfall of her relationship with Schwartz.

episodes.name: Secrets Revealed
episodes.overview: The cast members preview some of the funniest and most heartfelt unseen moments from the season.
